entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 32 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 32 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
